trans-unit.source: Represents an Outlook form region that is based on a user control.
trans-unit.target: 表示基于用户控件的 Outlook 窗体区域。

trans-unit.source: If you add an **Outlook Form Region** item to an Outlook add-in project, and select **Import an Outlook Form Storage (.ofs) file** in the first page of the **New Outlook Form Region** wizard, Visual Studio adds a form region class that inherits from <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你添加**Outlook 窗体区域**项向 Outlook 外接程序项目，然后选择**导入 Outlook 窗体存储 (.ofs) 文件**中的第一页**新建 Outlook 窗体区域**向导、 Visual Studio 将添加继承的窗体区域类<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase>。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegion" /> object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegion" /> 对象扩展的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase" /> object extends.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase" /> 对象扩展的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the form region factory that is associated with this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase" /> 关联的窗体区域工厂。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.IFormRegionFactory" /> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to track the form region factory class that created the current instance of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来跟踪创建的当前实例的窗体区域工厂类<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the form region is closed.
trans-unit.target: 在窗体区域关闭之前发生。

trans-unit.source: To get the Microsoft Office Outlook item for which the form region appears, call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取窗体区域将显示 Microsoft Office Outlook 项，请调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookItem%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To get the Inspector that displays the Outlook item, call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookFormRegion%2A> to get an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>, and then call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FormRegion.Inspector%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取显示的 Outlook 项的检查器，请调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookFormRegion%2A>要获取其实例的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FormRegion.Inspector%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after an instance of the form region is created but before the form region appears.
trans-unit.target: 在创建窗体区域的实例之后且在窗体区域显示之前发生。

trans-unit.source: To get the Outlook item for which the form region appears, call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookItem%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取为其显示窗体区域的 Outlook 项，请调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookItem%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To get the Inspector that displays the Outlook item, call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookFormRegion%2A> to get an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>, and then call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FormRegion.Inspector%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取显示的 Outlook 项的检查器，请调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookFormRegion%2A>要获取其实例的<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FormRegion.Inspector%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that you would like to locate in the <see langword="Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm" /> of the form region.
trans-unit.target: 您将在窗体区域的 <see langword="Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm" /> 中定位到的控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified control from the <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> of the form region.
trans-unit.target: 从表单区域的 <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> 返回指定控件。

trans-unit.source: The control that is specified by <paramref name="identifier" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identifier" /> 指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: The form region specified by the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookFormRegion" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookFormRegion" /> 属性所指定的窗体区域为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: *Identifier* does not match a control in the .ofs file.
trans-unit.target: 标识符与 .ofs 文件中的控件不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the controls on the form region.
trans-unit.target: 初始化窗体区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the native form region object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置本机窗体区域对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" /> that represents the form region.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示窗体区域的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion" />。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FormRegion.Inspector%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName> object to get an instance of the Inspector that displays the form region.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._FormRegion.Inspector%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.FormRegion?displayProperty=fullName>要获取的检查器显示窗体区域的实例对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Microsoft Office Outlook item for which the form region appears.
trans-unit.target: 获取为其显示窗体区域的 Microsoft Office Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the Outlook item for which the form region appears.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示为其显示窗体区域的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: Cast the object to the item type that the form region is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 强制转换到窗体区域关联的项类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the form region is associated with a contact item, cast the object that is returned by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookItem%2A> property to a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ContactItem>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果窗体区域与联系人项目相关联，将对象强制转换返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ImportedFormRegionBase.OutlookItem%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ContactItem>。
